general.gigTitle: build or rebuild website development, website developer, business landing page

sellerCard.oneLiner: Build or rebuild website development website developer
sellerCard.description: Hi there! I'm a dedicated web developer with a passion for building custom, high-quality websites that help businesses thrive online. Specializing in both the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Nodejs) and WordPress, I provide scalable, responsive, and SEO-friendly web solutions tailored to meet your unique needs.

description.content:
Are you looking to build or rebuild your website? Need a professional website developer to create a stunning business landing page? You've come to the right place!


I specialize in web development, bringing experience and creativity to help your business stand out online. Whether it's building a new website from scratch or giving your existing site a fresh look, I'm here to create an attractive, responsive, and functional business site tailored to your needs.


What I Offer:


  • Custom Web Development
  • Landing Page development
  • Business Website
  • Responsive and SEO-friendly
  • Unlimited revision
  • Fast Delivery


Technology I use to Build Website:


  • HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS
  • UI design 
  • React, Node, Express, Mongodb
  • API integration, API development
  • Digital ocean setup and web launch



Let's make your online presence shine with a site that reflects your brand's professionalism and vision. Contact me today to get started!

slide.name: build or rebuild website development, website developer, business landing page

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is included in the website build package?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: he build package includes a customized website with up to 5 pages, responsive design, basic SEO, and a contact form. Additional features can be added upon request.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you redesign my existing website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! I offer a rebuild and redesign service to refresh your website with a modern, user-friendly design that fits your brand.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What platform do you use to build websites?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I work with popular platforms like WordPress, Wix, and custom-built websites using HTML/CSS or JavaScript frameworks such as React.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How long does it take to build a website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The timeframe depends on the package chosen and the website's complexity. Typically, it takes 5-10 days for a standard website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be mobile-friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! All websites I create are fully responsive and optimized for both desktop and mobile devices.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I edit my website after it’s built?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I ensure you have full access to your website and can make edits. I also provide guidance if needed.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide hosting and domain services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I don’t offer hosting directly but can guide you in selecting a reliable hosting service and help you set it up.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you add custom features to my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! I can add features like e-commerce, blogs, galleries, booking systems, and more. Just let me know your requirements.

packageList.title: Essential Build Package
packageList.description: For static website from scratch following clients design

packageList.title: Rebuild & Refresh Package
packageList.description: Build custom website 3-5 page following clients given design no API integration

packageList.title: Ultimate Business Page Package
packageList.description: Full website 5-10 page basic API integration (Scalable) package

reviews.comment: Toki delivered exceptional results on our website development project. His technical skills, creativity, and attention to detail made a significant impact. We truly appreciate his contributions and recommend his services to others.
Toki was a fantastic collaborator. His expertise played a pivotal role in pushing our startup forward, and his promptness in addressing our requests was highly appreciated.

seller_response.comment:
Thank you for your kind words.

I really appreciate it.

reviews.comment: Working with Toki was an outstanding experience! While I had a basic concept in mind, Toki came up with several creative suggestions that truly enhanced the project. I highly recommend collaborating with him; he consistently delivers exceptional results.

With a perfect balance of design and functionality, Toki developed a website that delivers an intuitive and engaging user experience. His dedication ensured a high-performing and well-optimized platform.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback

reviews.comment:
It is really awesome to work with you guys. Im really Happy with the 10 Pages Website. My next work will go to you. 
Really really good.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind words, it's inspired me more.
